English: Let's have a look inside! Hope there are no demons.
Ha ha. That was really tough...
Congratulations Kasel! You have passed the test.
You have won the battle against your corrupted self.
Thank you, Hillia.
But this is not the end.
You should have retrieved a Crystal of Darkness from your corrupted self.
You mean this thing?
Yes. Take it to the Room of Purification to purify it. Then you can unleash your true powers with it.
Amazing. I feel like I'm bursting with energy!
Well done. You have grown a lot by overcoming these ordeals.
Don't forget this lesson, and devote yourself to overcoming any hardships in the future.
Thank you, Hillia. I will keep it in mind.
Wh... what you is?
And you why is so strong-ak?
Where's my brother?
Your brother? Why you ask me?
Calm down, Kasel!
Relax.
You'll only make bad choices.
Whew... whew...
Anyway...
Are these all bombs?
Bombs. Me proud!
My captain praise-ak!
Me bomb tree!
Captain? Tree? You mean the World Tree?
Me say wrong!
Tarokki in trouble!
World Tree?
Boom, vibrations
Drat!
It's coming from the World Tree!
Kasel, Kasel!
Wait!
Fools!
Sigh. Roi, take care of it and follow us!
Tarokki run!
He's gone... well, he shouldn't cause too much trouble.
He's running with a burning bomb.
Hang on. I'm coming to help!
Oh my! I don't remember inviting a kid knight.
Kasel!
That's not happening...
I'm going to save my brother!
Oh no...
Drat! Kasel!
Get off me, demon!
I can't let you do that!
Let's fight fair!
Ha ha ha.
Now, prepare to die.
Damn, is this it?
I couldn't even rescue my brother.
Frey,
Miss Cleo,
Roi...
Are we all going to die here?
I should've been more careful.
But... I made it this far
with everyone's help...
I can't just give up like this.
Frey,
Clause,
Miss Cleo,
Roi... I can't just leave them.
I won't be an embarrassment to my brother!
I can't die like this. I've got to save my brother and Frey!
Arrrrrrrrrrgh!
Casts Skill No. 3
This is...!
I'll keep them safe.
Clause, Frey,
Cleo, Roi!
I'll keep them safe!
Here I come, witch!
But you just wait and see. I will take your sword one day.
What?
Argh... wait!
How does the demon know about my mother...?
Ew, something is rotting.
It's the worse than anything I experienced before...
Well, I smell something. Doesn't smell like magic.
We are talking about corrupted magic.
Well, there is that smell too.
There used to be principalities in this region.
Then it turned into a battlefield against the Dar Lord.
When that battle was won, humanity was able to turn the tide in their favor.
But the whole region was completely ruined.
The Undead are still common here.
This means we may be held up here.
You don't get to kill them. They only keep coming at you.
We need to pass through them and make it quick.
Don't worry. I'm not stupid!
We will find Phillop and get out of here.
This must be how the dark plague looks like.
I can almost feel the pain from the look.
While humans are immune, it's deadly to animals.
The pain drives them mad and makes them attack everything around.
What about a cure?
Nothing concrete yet.
We are still working on it. No treatment for now.
I guess that's how it is. Let's make it quick!
Wow, that was rough.
It was destroying itself. Too much to take in...
Poor thing.
Studies suggest nothing can stay sane in that pain.
It'd be a mercy to end the misery.
Yeah. A mercy.
It's just too sad.
Hey, look. The Undead.
They were once proud warriors.
Now all but the urge to fight is lost.
The knighthood used to send out help to keep them under control.
Looks like that's not the case anymore.
Yeah.
With the World Tree under attack, this would be the last place anyone would care.
It's not exactly a pleasant view.
Having read about them doesn't help me, either.
OK. Let's get it over with. Fast.
Be careful, Clause.
You watch out. It won't be easy.
Whew, that was close.
They were tougher than we heard.
I think this place is overwhelmed by Dark Legion.
Maybe we should look if there is the Nucleus of Darkness.
We don't know that. I don't like leaving this as it is,
but let's focus on finding Phillop first.
We shouldn't be dragging our feet.
Kasel, you can't be serious.
We would be the only people who can destroy the Nucleus of Darkness.
It is our duty as knights!
We can't be sidetracked anymore.
Helping Naila and Kaulah was enough.
Shouldn't waste time on something we aren't even sure of!
Stop it, both of you.
We can keep an eye out for the Nucleus of Darkness while looking for Phillop.
There is no reason to argue while we can do both.
Right. We can deal with the Nucleus of Darkness when we know there is one.
Fair enough.
Kasel has a point.
Move out, then!
I hope all goes well...
Yuck, the stench!
It's rotten magic radiating from the Nucleus of Darkness, without a doubt!
It was the Nucleus of Darkness after all!
Fine. Now we can destroy it and move on.
Wait. This might be a trap.
What then, we can't just sit here.
We are running out of time.
Trap or not, I'd rather walk in and figure it out then!
Kasel, no!
Drat, Cleo! Close your eyes!
It's fine, as long as it's not the full darkness!
Frey! Kasel! Clause!
I'm here!
Kasel!
I'm okay, too. Stay together!
Haha, got the holy sword and you're suddenly a man.
You ran when your little sister was being taken by the demons,
how funny to see you act like a hero with that holy sword.
Funny indeed.
Drat... who is this?
So, you saved a few. Does that make you a hero?
I don't think so. You still stink of guilt.
You were the only survivor there.
You live because you ran. How dare you play a hero.
Pitiful. Shameful.
Enough! Show yourself! Come out and face me!
Calm down, Kasel!
It's the dark whispering, don't listen to it!
Ahh... dear Clause.
The conscience of the Royal Knights of Orvelia.
This is the Clause who kept silent and let the dirty knights go.
How exemplary!
Yeah...
This is a proud knight of justice who lights the darkness?
You turned your back on the dark and injustice!
Yet you wander everywhere, bragging about your knighthood.
Oh, so noble of you.
Keep it together!
This is a trick.
Don't let it get to you!
Cleo!
The sorceress from the Tower of the Sage, the flame master!
Your mother didn't want you,
your colleagues hated you.
You ditched the only friend because you're too afraid!
Stupid! That's not true!
Oh, yeah?
Is it not true that you still dream of your mama leaving?
Do your legs not shudder when you look upon dark places?
Still not true, Cleo?
Just block your ears, Cleo!
Don't listen to it!
There you are, Roi.
Swift Roi, people call you, right?
I thought you kill anyone for money.
I didn't know Swift Roi was into heroism.
Does that make you different now?
As if that would wash away the bloodstains on your hands?
Who are you kidding, Roi?
You are an assassin - you feed on killing!
Everyone, pull yourself together!
Frey, I see such darkness in you.
It's amusing to see it in a priest.
Are you sure you serve the Goddess Lua?
You'd do better serving Lea, the goddess of darkness!
Quiet, demon!
Be gone!
Hello! Somebody called a demon?
What!
How... how is it possible?
I created this place out of their own consciousness.
You are not supposed to be in it!
Duh. I'm a succubus and the dream world is my domain.
Are demons that desperate to let you be in charge?
Whatever, this is fun.
Let's play!
Whew!
That was some good workout!
Did a demon help us just now? What's going on?
What do you want?
Why would I help you?
Well, it looked fun!
Fun?
Yeah, fun!
You see, us demons live so long.
At a certain point, nothing is fun anymore.
So, I go look around for fun things.
And here, I smelled something fun, so I came to check!
She must be Epis, the Entertainer.
You mean that Epis from the war?
Huh? You know about me?
This is interesting.
That was 100 years ago.
That's an awful long time for humans.
It's been 100 years, indeed, but we haven't forgotten any of you.
I'm honored. My name is Kasel.
Aha. So, you're the one the sword chose this time.
Yes, I'm the one.
You do look very interesting.
Well, good luck!
Have to go. I smell something fun.
So long!
Wait, please!
Is this how demons are?
I wouldn't know the answer for that.
She seemed nice, though.
Shush, the Undead ahead.
Huh? I hear a voice.
Yaaaah!
Someone's there!
We should help!
Helping was unnecessary, but thanks anyways!
It's our sworn duty as knights.
I'm Clause, one of the Knights of Orvelia.
Same here. I'm Kasel.
You've come all this way from Orvelia?
This is a rough land to be in.
Call me Phillop.
You are Phillop!
Do you know anything about Hallinkeh the fire dragon?
A young lady with passion!
I'm sorry. I am a dragon hunter, but I don't know anything about Hallinkeh.
That thing was gone long before I was even born.
Oh, I see...
That's an ancient story. Why the curiosity?
Forgive my manners. I'm Cleo. I'm the fire sorceress from the Tower of the Sage.
I've been looking for some Clause on flame magic...
I see, I see.
I don't know Hallinkeh the dragon,
but I do know Hallinkeh the witch.
You know the witch?
I owe her favor from a while back.
Do you remember when?
That was three years ago or so.
Three years!
She may still be alive somewhere!
That's relief.
I have to say, you make a curious group.
A priest, two knights, a wizard, and an assassin.
All of you, here in Galluah Plains.
Can I ask why?
Kasel, show him.
Do you recognize this sword?
The holy sword!
Interesting. I hate it when my gut proves right.
I sensed something serious that sent me to regroup my old friends.
And the first thing I see is the holy sword.
I can tell the seals of the Orcs and Elves are lifted.
Aren't they?
Yes.
So, the holy sword is back. That means the world is in danger.
The hunch was real, after all.
Dwarves were also the part of sealing the sword.
I'm afraid there is nothing I can do to help you with this here.
I need a powerful smelter and it's in the volcanic region of La Dragia.
The place is empty now, however. Everyone fled from the attack.
You mean the Dwarven kingdom is no longer there?
Sadly so.
Those demons were beyond us. There was no choice.
The warriors of Windland have offered to help, so that's something.
My quest is to get whoever is behind it.
There are only few who can control that kind of army.
That's why I'm looking for other hunters that are still alive.
We are not all that useless. Not yet, Haha!
We could use your help as well if you can.
Well, why not.
My gut tells me you will lead me to my target.
Let's find out.
I see a huge one ahead.
Looks like a skeleton...
Kellsticks the Watchman!
He still lives!
OK. Let's think it over first. We will plan...
Kellsticks!!!
Kasel, what are you doing?
Huh? I heard you, barking mongrel.
Where are you?
You will know when I shatter your skull!
I will end you!
Hahaha. I thought you were going to shatter my skull.
What are you still doing with my minions, then?
You can't touch me!
I'm just starting!
Argh...!
Don't stand there, duck!
Oh no...
Clause!
Roi, get over there!
I will cover you!
Kasel, pull it together and keep going!
Ouch...
Clause, the wound is too deep.
I can help, but you shouldn't move for a while.
I can fight.
I said you shouldn't!
Frey, listen to me.
Kasel was right.
We need to act and do it quick, or it will be Elidora and Ogria all over again.
I'm fine, really. I'm not just a knight by name.
Don't do something stupid.
Don't worry.
Let's go help Kasel!
No! You little...
Die, Kellsticks!
This is for my village!
This is for my parents!
And this is for Karen!
Ha...haha...
Look at you, the sword bearer.
You are a shell, blind in vengeance.
Master will be pleased to see you!
Hahahaha...
Whew... whew...
I avenged them...
Are you okay, Kasel?
Are you all right?
I'm fine.
My village... it's all done.
Well done. May their souls rest in peace now.
Your parents. Karen, too.
When this is all over, let's go back and share the story.
And get drunk.
Don't try too hard.
Haha, who cares anymore!
Right. Let's do that, when it's all over!
Yes!
I smell the rotten magic nearby.
I'm so sick of this smell already...
It's worse than what we normally get.
Even I can vaguely feel it.
This is something sinister... and powerful.
Foolish humans again.
It's the one from Elidora!
Watch out, Cleo!
You don't know what he's up to!
Frey, stay close!
Yes!
I have to admit, I'm impressed.
I didn't expect you to make it here.
Thought either the trap or Kellsticks would finish you.
I knew it! The trap was your plan!
Coward!
Hey, you walked right into them.
I didn't think it would be that easy.
What do you want from us?
I learned the sword bearer's rage is
what triggers the true power of it.
You are very talented at it, boy.
With that power, you can aide in His return.
Him? Are you talking about the Dark Lord?
Nice to see you still alive, Phillop.
Didn't expect to you see you here.
Yes. Master is returning.
And it won't be the same as 100 years ago.
That's impossible! The power of the holy sword sealed him away!
Sealed away? With the holy sword?
Do you know what happened to your hero Kyle, after he did that?
That sword is not that holy after all.
Enough with the banal chats.
Let's see what that powerful sword can do.
Will you little curs be worthy enough to play the part in His plan?
Haha. Not bad!
I don't think this is a match to His might.
Step up, bearer. You'd better make the full use of that sword now.
Or you shall die!
Be careful, everyone!
This is way too powerful for me to block!
Damn, there is no way to survive that type of hit!
This can't be! Magic like that was rare even 100 years ago!
Stay together everyone!
I will try my best to shield us!
No, that won't do help!
His shield will crush us, just look at it!
Drat! The sword must be the only way.
It should be me!
What are you doing, silly!
The Knights of Orvelia know no defeat!
Forged with light are our swords and shields,
and we shall keep darkness at bay!
Madness!
Don't you see my shield at all?
I will crush you!
Argh!
It broke the shield!
Clause, Clause!
What are you waiting for!
Jump in!
Little worms... I may have underestimated you.
It's too late to stop the Nucleus of Darkness now. Stopping my spell won't change anything.
The Nucleus of Darkness will explode soon.
Hahahaha!
No!
Frey, stay with me!
We have to do what we can to stop it!
Yes, Cleo!
We won't go down that easy!
That's right! That'd be a shame!
What!
Aaah!
Still a bully, Malduk!
Epis! Betrayer! How are you still alive!
I'm so sick of you!
Oh, that makes two of us!
You are a boring man!
Let's see how long it takes you to change your mind.
You will wish you were dead when Master returns.
Haha, try to break off that one!
Hey! Running away again?
Of course, what did I expect from bony idiots!
Clause!
Clause!
What's going on?
......a tragedy.
A tragedy?
No, Clause! Stay with us!
The wound is too deep. Treating it won't buy us enough time!
I will do it anyways!
Awk... Kasel...
Clause, can you see me?
I'm sorry. The drink will.. have to wait...
Stop it! Don't say it!
Clause? Clause?
No, no, no... No, Clause...
Look at me! Say something!
Come on! Clause...
No...
This is not why you became the knight.
So many people are waiting for your help.
You can't stop here.
What can I do without you... we can't...
Please wake up!
Please...
I guess I was little too late.
It's already done. Don't be too hard on yourself.
I don't. I'm a demon.
You look old, by the way.
Unlike somebody, I age.
Maybe we are both late.
Kyle and Maria... We couldn't save them, either.
I didn't know cared that much. You didn't show up.
Hey, I may be a demon but I do care about friends.
I know.
That's why you are here now.
Yes.
In Lua, in her teaching,
Lived a man who guarded the justice and stood up for the weak.
Sir Clause ends his duty here today.
Let his soul returns to your arms,
may he rest in eternal peace now.
This was none of your fault.
He was a great knight.
As honorable as any of knights who sacrificed their life here 100 years ago.
You can leave this place in my care.
Thank you.
Malduk made a mess with his last spell.
Cleaning up will be quite a deal.
Don't worry. Epis and I can still deal with that much.
Once I'm done here, I will head to Windland to look for Lorraine.
I will see you there.
Which way to Arrovina?
Take the path down.
Heading to Arrovina?
Watch out as you get there.
They were never hostile people,
but lately they've been attacking anyone passing by.
Thank you.
Farewell, Phillop.
Hope to see you again.
Farewell, little lady.
Let's go, Kasel.
Clause didn't die in vain, we should continue.
You're right. We should get moving.
We don’t know what else they are planning to do.
We will find them all and stop them.
Hey, you should check your priority.
Weren’t releasing the holy sword your task?
After all, we are doing it to defeat the demons once and for good.
There must be another Nucleus of Darkness for we all know.
We must find and destroy them... to stop this from happening again.
I thought this could happen.
I'm worried about you.
Remember what Phillop said. It's not your fault.
Clause will be wracked with guilt if you end up dying.
I understand.
We will be in Arrovina soon.
Land of Arrows. As it suggests, it's territory of the dark Elves.
Don't get it wrong, dark elves have nothing to do with the darkness.
It only refers to their skin color and the soil color in this region.
I see...
This is going nowhere.
Listen, I feel for you but you can't do this forever.
I know nothing I can say will make you feel better, too.
It's rough.
Maybe time is what you need.
It worked for me.
Price of living in the dark age.
I see gnolls ahead.
You mean the stupid gnolls?
Don't let their clumsy moves fool you.
They are beasts. Never underestimate them.
I'd rather find a way around.
Hey!
Roi, is that a person standing beyond the gnolls?
Let's go.
Right with you.
Wow, wait!
It's like there are 3 Rois!
Come on, I'm not that bad!
Anyways, let's hurry. It looks dangerous!
Krawr! Krawr!
Good, they are running.
They probably have never saw real fire like mine!
Are you okay?
You look hurt, let me you help.
it. Now humans, too?
Crazy times.
Look out, Kasel!
Ouch!
Are you okay?
Yeah, it's just a scratch.
I guess we have to use force now.
We know nothing about this area.
We can use a guide.
Damn!
Stop trying or I will make you.
Maybe I should start with that point ears of yours.
Another totem puppet, is it?
Totem?
It's an object that releases dark magic.
The elf just said puppets, looks like there is
a mind-controlling one nearby.
Well, maybe not puppets, after all. You must be clean.
You can lower your weapons now. I have no reason to attack you now.
I thought you were controlled by the totem. Sorry about that.
He's too quick to change his attitude, I don't like it.
Don't trust him, Kasel.
We can at least ask if he's willing to cooperate.
Take us to the road to Windland and we will let you live.
How rude.
Well, I guess I owe you that much.
I'm Dimael Barka from the 44th Hunter Division of the Arrovina Royal Army.
I'm Kasel, a Royal Knight of Orvelia.
That should be enough for you.
I'm heading to Windland on a royal mission.
You must be in hurry.
Sorry to disappoint you but north is where our fortress is.
We need to take the southern path.
Why south?
Something is seriously wrong. The queen is out of control.
I've returned from a mission to Aegina Desert.
Then I saw the entire country went mad. They are on a killing spree.
They wouldn't care you're from Orvelia or what, they will kill you.
How come you didn't turn?
I was in Aegina for quite a while, probably that's why.
This spell turned everyone in the entire Arrovina.
That needs some time to work.
He has a point.
Mind-control is magic that needs to develop.
It'd be harder to get when targets are resistant to magic like Elves.
That doesn't suddenly make him trustworthy.
Kasel, let him lead the way.
That'd be better.
Curious.
Priests don't wear that look you have. Something has happened to you.
Whatever. I'll do as you say.
This way.
Why are there so many beasts here?
You'd better not be playing us.
Contrary to popular belief, soldiers value their own life.
Well, not so much when he failed to protect his own family...
Normally it's our job to patrol this area.
Only now hunters are all mad and focusing on something else.
That's why there are so many of them.
Too many. We are surrounded.
I can sense them moving.
Indeed.
And the gnolls are attacking us.
Prepare to engage!
You're not the boss of me!
Kraaawr!
Revenge!
Kyak!
Retreat!
Back to the boss!
Looks like they have a boss.
They sure do.
We almost got it a few times, but this one is smart.
It must be that one leading those gnolls.
Let's check, Kasel.
This might be the dark magic again.
Wait, I don't think they smelled it.
They did.
F-Frey?
They did.
We have no choice, Cleo.
Let's get it over with quickly.
Okay...
I smell gnolls.
I smell the scent of a boss one I told you about.
Are all Dark Elves good at this?
No, just the experienced trackers.
We are lucky. There are no other trackers for this one.
We are free to hunt.
Fine. I will take the lead.
Frey, watch our back.
Right.
No!
This cannot be the end...!
I will make sure it is!
Wait, stop, Kasel!
Ouch!
Argh.
Damn, mad ones were still on their mission.
Enemies!
For El Rosed!
Enough with this, Queen's dogs!
Drat!
You dirty pieces of waste!
Enemies... Must die...
Die!
That's your death bed!
You filthy bastards!
That's where you will die and rot!
This is crazy.
He's little too harsh to his own.
This is odd.
Mind-controlled is not a reason for that kind of hatred.
Is this some kind of dishonor in his culture?
Phew, finally.
Now you know what I was talking about.
Let's go. I don't want to spend a second more here.
Couldn't agree more.
I'm with them, too. I can't wait to get out of here.
This is just too much.
Clause was worth it.
I can't find the right thing to say, that's why I don't say anything at all.
I saw you move. You are quite good at battle.
You don't look like a trained soldier, though.
Must have been hell of a journey that taught you, was it?
That's none of your business.
Huh. There I thought humans love to brag their stories.
Wait.
Ew, that stench.
The Nucleus of Darkness is everywhere we go.
Yes, only the mainland of Orvelia was clear.
The return of the Dark Lord sounds much more plausible now.
I know, right? An artifact this powerful requires a great magic.
Only someone like the Dark Lord would be able to that.
So, that's the totem.
Frey, what can you tell?
This is so evil.
It consumes elven life around it to generate the magic.
It's surely powerful but the host will die from within.
That's typical of all powers of evil.
Stupid men. Falling for that, and wasting their life force away.
Hey, up ahead is where we have to pass anyway.
Let's do it fast and thoroughly.
Well, I'm with him this time.
Frey, get ready.
I am. I'm always ready.
Ever since I decided to join this journey.
I'm not sure if I want to fight people who are not even themselves.
Roi, is it pity or hate that makes you say that?
You decide. I'm helping!
Haw...
You are eating away yourself, why can't you see...
The totem is gone. It should be okay now.
It's all mad. How can someone do this.
To sacrifice future to gain power for now...
Hey, behind you!
Huh?
Frey!
Cleo!
I'm here, don't worry!
I'm right next to you!
No, please!
No, Epigael!
That's my sister, leave her alone!
Stop it!
Where is it coming from?
I don't know. This doesn't seem to affect us at all.
I can't tell where.
Frey, wipe the whole area off!
In the name of the Goddess Lua, I command you!
Return to where you belong, darkness!
I stand for the wrath of light,
and you shall be destroyed!
panting
Hey, are you all right?
What's wrong with you?
Drat, Epigael...
Avenge Epigael... avenge.
Hey!
Never mind, it was personal.
I'm good.
It wasn't strong enough to take over a body.
Must be a part of process to confuse and brainwash people.
This way, please.
He called his sister.
Did he lose his sister, as well?
That's why he didn't care about killing his own kind earlier.
I wonder what Clause would say to see us.
...Clause.
Do you see the fort over there?
That's Fort Troy, the heart of the Dark Elves.
What are you doing!
Enemies! Incoming attack!
Don't miss them!
Sorry. I didn't mean sidetrack from guiding your way.
They are not fully controlled.
They only react to strangers.
They won't be too hard to shake off.
You liar!
Let me get him!
No, Frey.
He's going right for the fort.
We are the bait.
Clause wouldn't try to take him at this point.
He'd rather help, if anything.
Right?
Yeah, but...
Come on, let's follow him.
This is not time to run.
If the dark magic is present, saving this place is our duty.
And I have the holy sword!
If we stop here, all the fights don't mean anything!
Come get me! I'm not afraid!
Good. They are all out to chase them.
It would never happen if they were themselves...
Except they aren't now. Nothing I can do about it.
Agamemnon, I've returned!
I'm back to end you!
You took away my life and I will make...
Uhh... argh...
What in the...
Even you couldn't escape.
My sister was sacrificed and you couldn't stop it.
Look at you now.
Let's end this.
I'm done with the fate, all of it.
I have my revenge.
I thought it would change something...
At least some resolution...

This fort is the same. The fight goes on outside.

He was neither demon nor human. He had this sad face.
He held my hands and show me you dying fighting for me.
I see now. It was all lie.
Oh brother... I wanted to avenge you.

You are a hero for us.
Thank you.
I'm a little ashamed. I didn't trust him until the end.
Impressive, Kasel. You forgave.

Not human, and not demon... so ominous...

Not good. I never heard of such a thing.
Neither a human nor a demon... What is it?

You are right!
That's a good idea.

Don't confuse the real enemy.
Dully noted.
Thank you.

hu... she's gonna be really angry at me with this...
